review: love my chromecast. good price and quick shipping on amazon. have a few of them set up in my house and easy to use for my parents.
author: Yuliyan

review: Love it!! I love being able to listen to my music playlist and watching the movies purchased or rented on You Tube.
author: Shelley Calhoun

review: Great for the price. But to use as a dedicated streaming device I would suggest the Roku 3. I use this in the bedroom to stream.
author: Justin Mestayer

review: use this at the office every day. make sure to use it with chrome if your using pc. perfect connection, can cast anything you have on the computer. great product.
author: Free Flow Academy "Lon"

review: Does not work properly. It looses it signal from the device you're trying to connect.

review: Yes it is great. I don't have cable so this made my Netflix work.
